wikitext.*:
'''minuial''' was the [[Sindarin]] name for the twilight of dawn, when the stars faded; an important time for the [[Elves]]. The twilight of dusk they named ''[[aduial]]''.<ref>{{App|D2}}, p. 1111</ref>

== Etymology ==
As [[Paul Strack]] explains, ''minuial'' is composed of ''[[min]]'' ("one") + ''[[uial]]'' ("twilight, evendim").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-2850476043.html|articlename=S. ''minuial'' n.|website=Eldamo|accessed=31 December 2023}}</ref>
